Posts.Content: Hello, My surgery is in 4 days and I have been asked to eat light 48 hours prior and a soft non-constipating diet my first week home. Can anyone tell me what they ate during these times? I am a detail person and do not like being given these generic meal choices.
Posts.Title: Pre and post surgery meals
